settings.title: Prolon Longevity Program
settings.subtitle: Cellular Rejuvenation & Metabolic Reset
settings.description:
Prolon is the only nutrition program patented for promoting longevity, healthspan & protecting lean body mass. The 5-day nutrition program includes everything you need to nourish yourself with premium quality plant-based food, while inducing the cellular, metabolic, and emotional benefits of prolonged fasting. Plus, nutritionist-led coaching sessions coach you through your fast. Completing 3 cycles per year can lead to a significant reduction in biological age.

• Healthy aging
• Cellular rejuvenation
• Metabolic support
• Protects lean muscle while losing weight
• Changed relationship with food
• More energy
• Mental clarity
• Rejuvenated skin

Book a Demo

settings.title: L-Nutra Health for Diabetes
settings.subtitle: Diabetes Remission Is Now Within Reach
settings.description:
L-Nutra Health is a nutrition-based type 2 diabetes regression program that delivers superior results at a lower cost than leading drugs. The experience is centered around a monthly 5-day regimen of scientifically formulated, plant-based nutrition and a robust support system that keeps focus and motivation for the new end goal: remission of diabetes.

• 5 days each month of ProLon for four months
• Provides many benefits of a daily heart-healthy diet of 120 days
• 25 days of fresh, ready meals reimbursable by insurance
• Digital tools and smart scale
• Registered dietician support

settings.title: Snacks & Supplements
settings.subtitle: Everyday Longevity Nutrition
settings.description:
ProLon’s line of bars, shakes and supplements are based on the 20 years of patented science behind our Fasting Mimicking Technology. Our clinically tested unique blends of macronutrients and micronutrients can be consumed without kicking your body out of a fasting state. ProLon supports a longevity lifestyle that includes intermittent fasting and healthier snack choices.

• Plant-based
• Non-GMO, vegan
• Keto friendly
• Gluten-free, soy-free, dairy-free
• Extend your fasting window


Learn More

settings.title: Nutrition For Longevity
settings.subtitle: Scientifically Tailored Ready Meals
settings.description:
Inspired by Dr. Valter Longo’s groundbreaking book, The Longevity Diet, our meals are inspired by the lessons of the Centenarian Hot Spots, known for inhabitants that live the longest and healthiest lives on record. Our meals are curated by registered dieticians and provide 6+ servings of vegetables per day.

• Mostly plant based, with pescatarian and flexitarian options
• Healthy, with controlled carbohydrates, calories, and sodium
• Reimbursed for 32 chronic conditions by Medicare, Medicaid, and 62 insurers

Learn More

View articles on the science of longevity nutrition
The Science

settings.title: MORE LIFE TO LIFE
settings.description: Our mission is to add more life to life, giving everyone the ability to thrive without limits beyond the boundaries of aging. Everyone should have the opportunity to attain a long and healthy life.

settings.title: SCIENTIFICALLY BACKED
settings.description: Our products are based on the same groundbreaking research. Clinical trials back the efficacy of our programs. Learn more here.

settings.title: FASTING WITH FOOD
settings.description: Get the benefits of periodic and intermittent fasting without feeling exhausted. Our nutrition doesn’t trigger the body’s nutrient-sensing pathways, keeping it in a fasting state.

settings.title: ACHIEVABLE
settings.description: 95% of people who have started Prolon have completed the program. We’ve sold millions of fasting kits and are the #1 Doctor-Recommended Nutrition program.

settings.title: Well deserved investment in me!
settings.description: A friend recommended Prolon to me. My goal was to reduce stomach inflammation and improve overall gut health. The program is well laid out & easy to follow. I viewed it as a well deserved investment in "me" Prolon did not disappoint, I have more energy, feel great & plan to continue down the path of healthier eating behavior for years to come.
settings.name: - Nancy S.

settings.title: I had such a great experience!
settings.description: Food was great. I had a lot of energy and slept well. I also lost 5 lbs which has been so hard to do! I'll definitely do Prolon again and have recommended it to friends.
settings.name: - Sarah S.

settings.title: Prolon changed my life!
settings.description: Prolon changed my life. I saw significant results on day three of the 5 day program. It teaches you how to eat and more importantly how you are supposed to feel when you are eating healthy. It has inspired me continue with this journey towards maintaining my health and well-being.
settings.name: - Fernando H.

settings.title: Get the benefits of fasting...
settings.description: Get the benefits of fasting without getting exhausted and burning off all the muscle. I resumed heavy weightlifting right after the fast. This really is a breakthrough.
settings.name: - Sky Christopherson

settings.title: I love the science supporting Prolon
settings.description: I love the science supporting Prolon. It allows me to suggest Prolon with confidence. I have used fasting and time restricted eating in my practice for years; Prolon augments this and takes it to the next level.
settings.name: - Amy Savagian, M.D.

settings.title: I highly recommend
settings.description: I highly recommend that every medical practice incorporate Prolon … and witness for themselves the many benefits it provides to patients.
settings.name: - Felice Gersh, M.D.

settings.title: The ProLon plan is well organized, easy to follow
settings.description: The Prolon plan is well organized, easy to follow, and well balanced throughout the day. I plan to use Prolon … to help my patients kickstart and adopt a healthier lifestyle.
